name: StudyFreaks
desc: A premium education platform for students in Hailakandi, Assam. Features specialized prep modules for CBSE, ASSEB, and JNVST entrance exams with a focus on high-speed performance.

name: Neural Inventory Manager
desc: An intelligent ERP solution built on Odoo for local businesses. Automates inventory tracking and uses Python scripts to predict stock-out events based on historical sales data.

name: Crypto-Signal Architect
desc: A real-time dashboard that pulls data from crypto exchanges. It uses Firebase Cloud Functions to push instant alerts to users when specific technical patterns are detected.

name: The Trading Blueprint
desc: A digital ecosystem for a 200-page trading guide. Includes an interactive table of contents, high-fidelity chart renders, and an automated delivery system for premium members.
